content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace with 27 coal as fuel, positioned at (62.0, -54.0) with direction UP, energy 1600.0, and warnings of no ingredients to smelt.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump, positioned at (107.5, -33.5) with direction UP, energy 0.0, and neighbours including pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5) and (108.5, -34.5).

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler, positioned at (111.5, -32.0) with direction UP, energy 0.0 or 2000.0, and neighbours including pipes at positions (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine generator, positioned at (117.5, -30.5) with direction UP, energy 15000.0, and neighbours including pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), and a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Pipe Groups
Consists of two pipe groups:
- One for water at position (107.5, -34.5) with status FULL_OUTPUT, connected to the offshore pump and boiler.
- One for steam at position (117.5, -34.5) with status WORKING or EMPTY, connected to the boiler and generator.

### Belts
Consists of two belts:
- One from position (63.5, -52.5) to (63.5, -54.5) with direction UP.
- One from position (64.5, -52.5) to (64.5, -54.5) with direction UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing the insertion.

### Errors when using entities without required resources
- Ensure that entities have the required resources (e.g., fuel, input liquid) before attempting to use them.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing its use.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables are defined in the provided logs.
